Name: Modern Warfighter Laser and Lights
Description:
A collection of modern weapon lights and lasers, with reworked effects for better-looking attachments.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CONTENTS

- EoTech NGAL
- EoTech AN/PEQ-15 with BUIS
- Steiner DBAL-i2 with BUIS
- Steiner DBAL-A3
- ZenitCo Perst4
- BE Meyers MAWL-C1+
- Inforce APL
- Inforce APLc
- Inforce WML
- Streamlight TLR1-HL
- Streamlight TLR7
- Surefire M300C (Standard mount & Offset)
- Surefire M600V (Standard mount & Offset)
- Surefire M952V (Standard mount & Offset)
- Surefire X300U

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

CREDITS

- Shampooh, Carkidd (assistance with implementation)
- Melon (providing models)
